required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Photobiomodulation Laser Therapy for COVID-19 Positive Patients With Pulmonary Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Multiwave Locked System (MLS) Laser Therapy for COVID-19 Positive Patients With Pulmonary Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of MLS laser therapy as a treatment for pulmonary complications due to COVID-19 infection.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants will be randomized into treatment vs. control group. Both groups will receive regular inpatient medical treatment. Participants in the experimental arm will receive laser treatments once daily for 4 days. Treatments will be delivered to the patients in a prone position using a 10 by 25 cm laser field across each lung with 7j/cm2 at 1500 Hz. Standard nursing protocols would be used to identify participant's pulmonary status throughout treatment.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This study will utilize a randomized parallel assignment

primary_outcome.description: ICU on vent, ICU not requiring ventilation, Discharge to Rehab requiring assistance, Discharge to Home unable to perform ADL's, Discharge to Home able to perform ADL's
Patients oxygen requirements pulse oximetry will be evaluated for change from pre and post individual treatment as well as end of protocol
The change in pre treatment levels and 24 hours post final treatment
Pre treatment CXR will be compared to post treatment CXR using the RALE CXR evaluation scale
The change in pretreatment and post treatment BCRSS will be evaluated
The change in pretreatment and post treatment scores will be evaluated
The change in pretreatment and post treatment scores will be evaluated
The change in pretreatment and post treatment levels will be evaluated The change in pretreatment and post treatment levels will be evalutated

arm_group.description: Participants will receive MLS laser treatment along with regular inpatient medical care.
Participants will receive regular inpatient medical care.

intervention.description: Treatments will be delivered to the participants days 1-4, in a prone position using a 10 by 25 cm laser field across each lung with 7j/cm2 at 1500 Hz.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- COVID-19 positive
- Pulmonary compromise requiring oxygen support of approximately 2-6 liters
- Able to self prone, or support in self-sitting position
Exclusion Criteria:
- Ventilator management
- Patients with autoimmune disorders or inflammatory conditions not related to COVID-19
- Pregnant women
